CREATION.LEDGER.PROCESS_1:
connect Ledger with your PC，
and open TRON APP in Ledger
CREATION.LEDGER.PROCESS_3: connection completed. You can use it now.
CREATION.LEDGER.CONNECT_TIMEOUT: connection timed out; please connect Ledger and open TRON APP
CREATION.LEDGER.AUTHORIZE_TIMEOUT: authorization timed out; please try again
CREATION.LEDGER.NO_TOKEN: the current Ledger does not support transfers with this token
CREATION.LEDGER.ALERT.BODY: only basic transfer features are available for hardware wallet accounts at the moment; you cannot authorize DApps yet
CREATION.LEDGER.NOT_MATCH: account address does not match Ledger
CREATION.LEDGER.TIP_CANCEL_TRANSACTION: Canceled, please choose to refuse in ledger
CHOOSING_TYPE.TITLE: Choosing type

CREATION_CRITERIA.IS_ALPHANUMERIC: Contains only alphanumeric characters, along with optional spaces
CREATION_CRITERIA.IS_UNIQUE: Is not in use by any of your other accounts
WRITING_PHRASE: Please copy down the mnemonic for your new account below. You will have to confirm the mnemonic on the next screen
CONFIRMING_PHRASE: You must now confirm your mnemonic phrase. Select the words below in the correct order to finalise your account creation
ACCOUNT_NAME.DESC: Please choose a memorable name for your new account
MNEMONIC_IMPORT.DESC: Please enter your mnemonic phrase below. This will either be 12 or 24 words in length (separated by spaces)
MNEMONIC_IMPORT.SELECTION: Select the accounts you would like to import below
PRIVATE_KEY_IMPORT.DESC: Please enter your private key below. This can only contain hexadecimal characters
ACCOUNT.RECEIVE.DESC: This address supports transferring to TRX and its token
ACCOUNT.TRANSFER.DESC: "Deposit" means to transfer tokens from the main chain to the side chain. TRX and TRC10 can be deposited by default; while TRC20 tokens can only be deposited after the requester has completed the contract deployment. No extra service fee will be charged for deposit.
ACCOUNT.TRANSFER.DESC2: Withdraw means to transfer tokens from the side chain to the main chain. Withdrawal consumes 10 TRX each time as a service fee.
CONFIRMATIONS.BODY: The website {hostname} is requesting your permission to {action}
CONFIRMATIONS.WHITELIST.TITLE: Enable automatic signing
CONFIRMATIONS.WHITELIST.BODY: This allows TronLink to automatically sign similar transactions on your behalf
CONFIRMATIONS.AUTO_AUTHORIZE.DESC: Add the app to the white list so it will be authenticated automatically. The pop-up window will also stop showing.

ACCOUNTS.CONFIRM_DELETE.BODY: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
MENU.ADD_TRC20_TOKEN.INPUT_PLACE_HOLDER: Please enter the contract address of TRC20token
ALERT.DELETE_ACCOUNT.ONLY_ONE: At least one account is required
BANK.INDEX.PLACEHOLDER: If left blank, current payment address will be used.
BANK.INDEX.RENTNUMFORMATERROR: Invalid format. Please re-enter an integrid between {min}-{max}
BANK.INDEX.OVERTAKEORDERNUM: An address can only have up to 5 active orders
BANK.INDEX.NOTONLINEADDRESS: The address is not activated. Please transfer any amount of TRX to activate it
BANK.INDEX.OVERTAKEMAXNUM: The resource pool balance is insufficient, please adjust the quantity
BANK.INDEX.RENTDAYFORMATERROR: Invalid format. Please enter an integrid between {min}-{max}
BANK.INDEX.CURRENTRATE: (Get equivalent energy to burn {min}TRX or freeze {total}TRX)
BANK.HELP.TIPSONE: 1.After the payment is completed, the energy arrives in about 1 minute. Due to broadcast delays, etc., there may be a 5-10 minute delay in certain cases.
BANK.HELP.TIPSTWO: 2.The same receiving address can only have up to 5 active orders.
BANK.HELP.TIPSFOUR: 4.The order will expire at x hours after the order goes into effect (x = lease days * 24 hours), please pay attention to the order status.
BANK.RENTDETAIL.TITLE: Order details
BANK.RENTNUMMODAL.TITLE: Rent amount instructions
BANK.RENTNUMMODAL.CONTENT: Please fill in the amount of TRX you wish to freeze, and you will get the energy generated by freezing the corresponding amount of TRX. According to the TRON network mechanism, freezing the energy generated by each TRX is related to the freezing amount of the entire network, so the energy will fluctuate in real time.
BANK.RENTINFO.SUCCESS: Your payment was successful, energy will arrive in your account in 1 min
BANK.RENTINFO.FAILED: Renting failed, you cannot place five orders within 1 minute.
BANK.RENTINFO.TIMEOUT: Payment overtime, please check the network
EXCEPTION.FORMAT_ERROR_MNEMONIC: Please enter the correct and complete mnemonic.
EXCEPTION.ACCOUNT_EXIST: The address already exists. Please do not add again.
EXCEPTION.ADD_NODE.NAME: More than 4 characters are required.
EXCEPTION.ADD_NODE.NODE_URL: Incorrect format. Please start with http:// or https://
EXCEPTION.SEND.ADDRESS_SAME_ERROR: Payment address cannot be the same as recipient address.
EXCEPTION.SEND.ADDRESS_UNACTIVATED_ERROR: The address has not been activated. An extra 0.1 TRX will be deducted from your account to activate the address.
EXCEPTION.SEND.AMOUNT_DECIMALS_ERROR: Accurate to {decimals}. Please adjust the number of digits after the decimal point.
EXCEPTION.SEND.BANDWIDTH_NOT_ENOUGH_ERRO: Insufficient bandwidth. Small amount of extra TRX (no more than 1 TRX) will be consumed.
EXCEPTION.SEND.ENERGY_NOT_ENOUGH_ERROR: Insufficient energy. Small amount of extra TRX (no more than 1 TRX) will be consumed.
EXCEPTION.SEND.BANDWIDTH_ENERGY_NOT_ENOU: Insufficient energy and bandwidth. Small amount of extra TRX (no more than 1 TRX) will be consumed.
EXCEPTION.SEND.BANDWIDTH_NOT_ENOUGH_TRX_: Insufficient bandwidth, a small amout of TRX will be consumed, insufficient TRX balance
EXCEPTION.SEND.ENERGY_NOT_ENOUGH_TRX_ERR: Insufficient Energy, a small amout of TRX will be consumed, insufficient TRX balance
EXCEPTION.SEND.BANDWIDTH_ENERGY_NOT_ENOU: Insufficient bandwidth and Energy, a small amout of TRX will be consumed, insufficient TRX balance
EXCEPTION.SEND.ADDRESS_UNACTIVATED_TRC20: The address is not activated, 20token cannot be sent. Please transfer TRX to activate the address.
EXCEPTION.TRANSFER.MAIN_ADDRESS_NO_ACTIV: This address is not activated on the Tron main chain
USDT.MAIN_TITLE1: 该计划有以下四大特点
USDT.MAIN_TITLE1.SUBTITLE1.CONTENT: 整个奖励计划持续周期长达100天。
USDT.MAIN_TITLE1.SUBTITLE3.CONTENT: 奖励无需用户任何花费和成本。
USDT.MAIN_TITLE1.SUBTITLE4.CONTENT: 按照当前的USDT总额计算，整个奖励支出将达到1亿元人民币，且根据情况上不封顶。
ASSET.ADD_TOKEN.PLACEHOLDER: Token name or full contract address
ASSET.CONFIRM.CONTENT: The token balance is 0. When hidden, the token will not be displayed in the list.
TRANSACTION_DETAIL.GO_TRONSCAN: Go to Tronscan for detailed data
TRANSACTION_DETAIL.COPYED: The screenshot is copied to the clipboard
TRANSACTION_DETAIL.EXPLAIN.CONSUME: TRX consumption due to activation of new addresses or inadequate bandwidth or energy
NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: transaction finished
NOTIFICATIONS.MESSAGE: go to Tronscan to check details
ALERT.UPDATE_DESCRIPTION.TITLE: Update Description
ALERT.UPDATE_DESCRIPTION.BODY: The update mainly supports TRON's official SUN Network. A side chain feature has been added. Now you can transfer your assets between the main chain and the side chain, and use Dapps that have already supported side chain by TronLink. Please note that the side chain does not support ledger yet.
